jei.stonecatalysts:tooltip_stone_catalys: Stone Catalyst, ,Replaces water source when hit by flowing lava above, ,Place catalyst below water source
jei.stonecatalysts:tooltip_cobblestone_c: Cobblestone Catalyst, ,Replaces lava flow when it touches water, ,Place catalyst below lava flow
jei.stonecatalysts:information_tab_desc: StoneCatalysts allows generation of alternate stone variants with a standard cobble gen. Simply place the catalyst below where the stone or cobble block would normally generate and the block will instead generate as the same block as the catalyst
